rdf:Description.dct:title: Papuan Voices Media Files
rdf:Description.dct:description:
Papuan Voices Media Files (wav) - Supplement to dataset Papuan Voices

Papuan Voices presents phonetically-transcribed primary recordings, from numerous places throughout Papua island

Available online at: https://papuanvoices.clld.org

rdf:Description.dct:title: Vanuatu Voices Audio Files
rdf:Description.dct:description:
Audio Files (WAV format) of the project Vanuatu Voices which presents phonetically-transcribed primary recordings, from numerous villages throughout different islands, to both document and exhibit the extensive variation and unparalleled diversity of the Vanuatu languages.

Available online at https://vanuatuvoices.clld.org

rdf:Description.dct:title: EDICTOR. A web-based interactive tool for creating, inspecting, editing, and publishing etymological datasets

foaf:Organization.foaf:name: European Commission

rdf:Description.dct:description:
After quite a few features have been added, and numerous bugs have been fixed since the first beta release, we publish this as the first official release of the EDICTOR tool, which is also available for direct use from digling.org/edictor. When using this tool, which is published under a free license, please do me a favor and make sure that the data you created with help of this tool is also published with a free license, and archived in public repositories, if you manage to present your data in a publication. Please also quote the tool, by quoting its latest version:

List, Johann-Mattis (2020): EDICTOR. A web-based tool for creating, maintaining, and publishing etymological data. Version 1.0.0. Jena: Max Planck Institute for the Science of Human History. URL: https://digling.org/edictor/  DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.3832086

foaf:Project.dct:title: Computer-Assisted Language Comparison: Reconciling Computational and Classical Approaches in Historical Linguistics

foaf:Organization.foaf:name: European Commission

rdf:Description.dct:title: EDICTOR. A web-based interactive tool for creating, inspecting, editing, and publishing etymological datasets
rdf:Description.dct:description: This software offers the most recent and mostly stable version of the EDICTOR tool, also available for direct usage from digling.org/edictor/.

rdf:Description.dct:title: edictor: EDICTOR version 0.1 Beta Test Release
rdf:Description.dct:description: This is a first mostly workable release of the EDICTOR which still lacks some additional documentation and a couple of issues which need to be solved before version 1.0, but which can be used for all actions which are shown in this demo video on YouTube.

rdf:Description.dct:title: lingpy/language-island-paper: Bangime and Friends
rdf:Description.dct:description:

If you use the code, please also cite the original paper:

Hantgan, Abbie and List, Johann-Mattis (forthcoming): Bangime. Secret language, language isolate, or language island? Journal of Language Contact.
